content: Address the real problem and reduce the need. Slavery and bad working conditions perpetuating a global crises. No choice and no option out leading to the vary creation of these issues. We live in a world of transparency. The ones who have profited from the rape, destruction, and pollution of the planet and people now attempt to hold back the corrections needed for life on this planet to survive. Silence is death. Raise your voice and act to move us forward to a better world and understanding of it.
